name: 阿瑞尔·莫特曼
name_full: 阿瑞尔·莫特曼 Ariel Mortman
introduction: boutBest known to American audiences as Hayley Woods in the Netflix original series Greenhouse Academy. She previously starred in Disney's Northern Star from 2014 to 2016, which ran in Israel.Before FameShe trained at the Cameri and Nissan Nativ Acting Studios before serving in the Israel Defense Forces.TriviaShe was featured in a 3D film called Dreaming to Fly.Family LifeShe would split her time between New York and Israel. She has a brother named Daniel Mortman and a sister named Edan.Associated WithShe starred alongside Finn Roberts in Greenhouse Academy.
